name: Blacksquad - FOUNDER'S PACKAGE
detailed_description:
Founders Package for Early Access users!
you can have the following 7 items permanently.

SR47 GL COBRA
MDR GL
SIZMPX
SR47 GL
DSR1
BRODY
AIM TIGHT name banner

*SR47 GL COBRA is exclusive skin (Only for Founders Package)

short_description:
Founders Package for Early Access users!
you can have the following 7 items permanently.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese-Brazil, Japanese, Thai, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.2GHZ / AMD Athlon 64 X2 2.66GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 8600 OR GT630 / RADEON HD 6750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CORE2 DUO 2.4CHZ / AMD Phenom X4 820
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 / Radeon HD 7790
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
